$Rays challenged force out call at 2nd; call upheld - out

$There were two challenges: Pirates challenged call of out at first for double play; that call was overturned - forceout; Giants then challenged that Polanco had committed slide interference at 2nd; that call was upheld and inning continued

$Pirates challenged that Belt did not retouch second base on way back to first; heslid into base, got up on 3rd base side of base and did not touch 2nd on way back to first; call was overturned - double play
